data.title: Silver's record break above $60 shows how central the metal has become to the AI build-out
data.description: AI's rapid growth is driving demand for computing power and silver-rich chips like GPUs and TPUs that rely on high-performance semiconductors.
data.content:
Silver blew past $60 per troy ounce for the first time on Tuesday, extending its blistering rally as traders race into a metal increasingly linked to the build-out of AI infrastructure.
